text: Nagarapuraanam is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by Ambadi Krishnan and starring Jagadish and Thilakan in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/nagarapuranam-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Thilakan as Sathyannarayanan * Jagadish as Manikuttan * Shammi Thilakan as Manikandan * Cochin Haneefa as Manikyan Thamburan * Kalabhavan Rahman as Badran *Rizabawa as Jayamohan * Mafiya Sasi as Karan Chand *Jose Pellissery as Pankajakshan * Kanya Bharathi as Jeesy Jose * Meera * TS Raju * Salu Kuttanadu *Bobby Kottarakkara * Mamukkoya * Praseetha * V Viswanathamenon ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Nagarapuraanam
